footer.description: Open collaboration platform for public policy

home.description: Innovative platform for Taiwan's digital governance

hero.subtitle: vTaiwan is an open collaboration platform that promotes dialogue between government and citizens, enabling everyone to participate in the public policy formation process.

propose.title: Propose Issues
propose.description: Anyone can propose public policy issues worth discussing, which enter the discussion phase after initial review.

discuss.title: Open Discussion
discuss.description: Through online discussions and physical meetings, collect opinions from all parties to form concrete policy recommendations.

policy.title: Policy Formation
policy.description: Transform citizen consensus into concrete policy recommendations and submit them to relevant government departments for reference and implementation.

cta.title: Join us in shaping Taiwan's future together
cta.description: Whether you are a citizen, expert, government official, or anyone concerned about public affairs, you are welcome to join the vTaiwan platform and contribute your ideas.

contributors.title: Contributors
contributors.joinUsDescription: Whether you are a citizen, expert, government official, or anyone concerned about public affairs, you are welcome to join the vTaiwan platform.

descriptions.projectManager: Responsible for overall project planning and coordination
descriptions.techDirector: Responsible for technical architecture and platform development
descriptions.designer: Responsible for vTaiwan website design and experience curation

blog.title: Title
blog.author: Author
blog.tagsPlaceholder: e.g., vTaiwan, Digital Democracy, Open Government
blog.deleteConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this article? This action cannot be undone.
blog.saveError: An error occurred while saving, please try again later
blog.deleteError: An error occurred while deleting, please try again later
blog.loginRequired: Please login to post an article
blog.postError: An error occurred while posting the article, please try again later

projects.title: Project List
projects.description: All public policy collaboration projects on the vTaiwan platform. Each project goes through the process of proposal, discussion, consensus building, and policy recommendations.

cta.title: Want to propose a new project?
cta.description: If you have public policy issues worth discussing, you are welcome to propose project suggestions.

projectDetail.discussDesc: Share your ideas and suggestions in the project discussion area and exchange opinions with other participants.
projectDetail.contributeDesc: Provide professional knowledge, research data, or implementation experience to help project development.
projectDetail.shareDesc: Share project information with more friends who care about this issue to expand influence.
projectDetail.joinDesc: Become a core team member of the project and participate in decision-making and execution work.
projectDetail.notFoundDesc: The project you are looking for does not exist or has been removed.

meetups.title: Meetups
meetups.description: vTaiwan regularly hosts online and physical meetings to discuss project progress and public policy issues. Everyone is welcome to participate!

upcoming.title: Upcoming Meetups
upcoming.empty: No upcoming meetups at the moment

past.title: Past Meetups
past.empty: No past meetup records at the moment

calendar.title: Meetup Calendar
calendar.description: Subscribe to our meetup calendar to never miss any important meetings.

host.title: Want to host a meetup?
host.description: If you want to host a discussion on a specific project or public policy issue, please contact us.

meetupDetail.notFoundDesc: The meetup you are looking for does not exist or has been removed.
